body:
Honeybee uses Radiance's gensky to generate CIE skies. You can find more details [here](http://www.radiance-online.org/learning/documentation/manual-pages/pdfs/gensky.pdf); and see the source code: [https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/blob/master/src/gen/gensky.c](https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/blob/master/src/gen/gensky.c)

There are several discussions on Radiance mailing list about the topic like [this recent one](http://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2014-November/010628.html) [[reply](http://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2015-January/010662.html)] and blog posts like [this one](http://www.bozzograo.net/radiance/index.php?module=FAQ&func=display&faqid=5).
